subject: Re: Daniel meet Andy - Criminal Law Group
preview: Hi Daniel,  Happy to know it was the right file,  thank you so much!  Always happy to help you anytime.

full_threads.body:
Hi Daniel,

Happy to know it was the right file, thank you so much!

Always happy to help you anytime.

Hi Allie

This is what Im looking for
I will be migrating DNS to our platform tomorrow

Thanks

Daniel Tadros

Onboarding ‑ Technical Lead



T +61 3 9257 0700

E dtadros@kmtech.com.au

W kmtech.com.au









The human face of tech

For all support enquiries, please raise a service request at here or please contact our support team on support@kmtech.com.au or 1300 400 266

Hey Daniel,

Thanks for the heads-up!

Attached is the current zone file for criminallawgroup.com.au from Kinsta.

Let me know if everything looks good, or if you need anything updated on our end.

Happy to help with the migration however I can.

Cheers,
Allie

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Allie Borcena

full_threads.body:
Hi Daniel,

Looping in @Wolf IQ Support to provide the current DNS Zone for criminallawgroup.com.au so you can complete the migration on your end.

Thanks,
Andy

On Wed, Jul 16, 2025 at 9:59 AM Daniel Tadros <dtadros@kmtech.com.au> wrote:

Hi Andy

We're looking to take over DNS completely.

We have already transferred the domains to our management.
Are you able to send me the current Zone so I can migrate that too.

Cheers

Daniel Tadros

Subject: Re: Daniel meet Andy - Criminal Law Group


Hi Daniel,


Thanks for reaching out and thanks Dimitri for the intro.


We host the criminallawgroup.com.au site on our servers and also manage the DNS. If there's a specific update or record you'd like changed, just let us know and we can take care of it for you.


Happy to coordinate however works best.


Thanks,
Andy


On Wed, Jul 16, 2025 at 7:31 AM Dimitri Galanis <dimitri@pointdot.com.au> wrote:
Hi Daniel,

Meet Andy from WOLFIQ, they're hosting the criminallawgroup.com.au domain on premium servers and might be the DNS managers also. Over to you guys.

@Andy Crebar - Daniel has reached out to pointdot on behalf of CLG as their IT managers and was wondering where the DNS Zone for criminallawgroup.com.au is?

Regards,
Dimitri
